resources.string: mount ext4 /dev/stl13 /data rw noatime nosuid nodev barrier=0 data=writeback nobh nodiratime noauto_da_alloc
mount ext4 /dev/block/mmcblk0p2 /data rw noatime nosuid nodev barrier=0 data=writeback nobh nodiratime noauto_da_alloc
mkdir /data/dalvik-cache 0771 system system chown system system /data/dalvik-cache chmod 0771 /data/dalvik-cache mkdir /data/app 0771 system system

mount ext4 /dev/block/mmcblk0p2 /data/app rw noatime nosuid nodev barrier=0 data=writeback nobh nodiratime noauto_da_alloc mount ext4 /dev/block/mmcblk0p3 /data/dalvik-cache rw noatime nosuid nodev barrier=0 data=writeback nobh nodiratime noauto_da_alloc
chown system system /data chmod 0771 /data trigger post-fs
